reason: Generic template question - asks why a subsection number '2-3. 불임·난임휴직' is 'important'; treats section label as subject with a vague generic suffix
Nonsensical - '휴직사유를 받을 수 있는 자격' (qualifications to receive a leave reason); you don't 'receive' a leave reason
Nonsensical - '휴직사유는 몇 년까지 가능한가요?' (how many years is a leave reason possible for?); leave reasons don't have a year limit
Nonsensical - '휴직의 요건을 받을 수 있는 자격' (qualifications to receive leave requirements); template garbage, you don't 'receive' requirements
Nonsensical - '휴직의 요건 기간 중 신분' (status during the period of leave requirements); 'leave requirements' is not a time period
Nonsensical - '휴직기간 및 횟수를 받을 수 있는 자격' (qualifications to receive leave period and frequency); template garbage
Nonsensical - '교직원의 임무를 위해 필요한 서류' (documents needed for teachers' duties); duties are not something you file paperwork for
Nonsensical - '교직원의 임무를 신청할 때' (when applying for teachers' duties); you don't 'apply for' duties
Nonsensical - '교직원의 임무에 특례가 적용되는 경우' (special exceptions to duties); template question inappropriately applied to section title about job duties
Nonsensical - '교직원의 임무가 적용되지 않는 경우' (cases where duties don't apply); duties always apply, this is template garbage
Nonsensical - '직무상 의무의 양정 기준' (disciplinary sentencing standards of duty obligations); 양정 기준 is a disciplinary term awkwardly applied to the concept of obligations itself
Nonsensical - '교직원의 임무를 잘못 처리하면' (if you incorrectly process teachers' duties); duties are not something you 'process'
Nonsensical - '복무일반을 하려면 어떻게 해야 하나요?' (how do I do general service affairs?); '복무일반' is a section title, not an action
Nonsensical - '복무일반 신청 방법' (how to apply for general service affairs); you don't 'apply for' a section heading
Nonsensical - '복무일반은 얼마나 인정되나요?' (how much is general service affairs recognized?); section title treated as a countable benefit
Nonsensical - '복무일반의 일수는 어떻게 되나요?' (how many days for general service affairs?); section title treated as a leave type with countable days
Template garbage - '복무일반을 분류하면 어떻게 되나요?' (how do you classify general service affairs?); generic template applied to section heading
Near-duplicate of q_4_0091 - '복무일반의 구분이 어떻게 되나요?' is the same question rephrased
Nonsensical - '일반적 관리를 하려면 어떤 요건이 필요한가요?' (what requirements to do general management?); section title '일반적 관리' treated as an action to apply for
Nonsensical - '일반적 관리의 처리 기한' (processing deadline for general management); section title treated as a procedural item with deadlines
Nonsensical - '일반적 관리를 하려면 어떻게 해야 하나요?' (how do I do general management?); section title treated as a specific procedure
Nonsensical - '교육공무원법은 몇 년까지 가능한가요?' (how many years is the Education Public Officials Act possible for?); a law doesn't have a year limit
Garbled phrasing - '학교장 근무 상황 신청 방법을 신청할 때 유의사항' (precautions when applying for the application method); redundant double 신청 is nonsensical
Nonsensical - '학교장 근무 상황 신청 방법 중 보수는 어떻게 되나요?' (what is the salary in the application method?); an application method doesn't have a salary
Nonsensical - '교육공무원법을 신청할 때 유의사항' (precautions when applying for the Education Public Officials Act); you don't 'apply for' a law
Nonsensical - '휴업일 기간 중 신분은 어떻게 되나요?' (what is your status during break days?); your civil servant status doesn't change during regular break days
Nonsensical - '수업일에 관한 기간과 횟수를 알려주세요' (tell me the period and frequency of school days); template question treating school days as if they were a leave type
Nonsensical - '수업일 기간은 어떻게 계산하나요?' (how do you calculate school day periods?); school days are not calculated like leave periods
Nonsensical - '수업일 중 보수는 어떻게 되나요?' (what is the salary during school days?); normal salary applies during school days, making this meaningless
Nonsensical - '휴업일에서 서류 제출 기한은 어떻게 되나요?' (document submission deadline for break days?); break days don't have document submission deadlines
Nonsensical - '메시지 전송 기간에 승급이 되나요?' (can you get promoted during message sending period?); completely unrelated concepts mashed together
Grammatically broken - '공람자로 추가된 담당자가 근무상황의 휴가세부사항을 확인의 신청 절차는 어떻게 되나요?' is garbled and unclear
Nonsensical - '제6조(직무대리의 운영)는 얼마나 인정되나요?' (how much is Article 6 recognized?); a regulation article is not something that gets 'recognized' in quantity
Nonsensical - '제6조(직무대리의 운영)의 일수는 어떻게 되나요?' (how many days for Article 6?); a regulation article doesn't have a day count
Nonsensical - '겸임·직무대리·겸직의 2번째 항목은 무엇인가요?' asks for the '2nd item' of a topic title as if it's a numbered list
Nonsensical - '제6조(직무대리의 운영)는 얼마나 인정되나요?' (how much is Article 6 recognized?); same template problem as q_4_0275
Nonsensical - '제6조(직무대리의 운영)의 일수는 어떻게 되나요?' (how many days for Article 6?); same template problem as q_4_0276
Nonsensical - extremely long case title (yes/no question about 육아휴직 중 아르바이트) used as subject with '몇 년까지 가능한가요?' tacked on; a yes/no case question doesn't have a year limit
Nonsensical - same long case title with '기간은 어떻게 계산하나요?' tacked on; the case is a yes/no question, not a time-based concept
Nonsensical - same long case title with '경력평정에 어떻게 반영되나요?' tacked on; a yes/no case question about whether something is allowed doesn't get reflected in career evaluation
Nonsensical - '부동산 임대가 교원의 경력에 어떤 영향을 미치나요?' (how does real estate rental affect a teacher's career?); rental activity doesn't affect career evaluation records
Nonsensical - '어떤 경우에 학원법이 가능한가요?' (in what case is the Academy Act possible?); a law is not something that becomes 'possible'
Nonsensical - '평생직업교육학원을 받을 수 있는 자격' (qualifications to receive a lifelong vocational education academy); you don't 'receive' an academy
Nonsensical - '어떤 경우에 평생직업교육학원이 가능한가요?' (in what case is a lifelong vocational education academy possible?); an academy is not something that becomes 'possible' for a person
Nonsensical - '평생직업교육학원의 절차' (the procedure of a lifelong vocational education academy); an academy type doesn't have a 'procedure' by itself
Nonsensical - '평생직업교육학원을 하려면' (how do I do a lifelong vocational education academy?); an academy is not an action; missing critical verb like 'teach at'
Nonsensical - '평생직업교육학원 기간은 어떻게 계산하나요?' (how to calculate the period of an academy?); an academy type doesn't have a calculable period
Nonsensical - '평생직업교육학원에 관한 기간과 횟수' (period and frequency of an academy); template treating an academy type as if it were a leave type

Nonsensical - '지침의 목적 및 적용이 경력평정에 어떻게 반영되나요?' (how is purpose and application of guidelines reflected in career evaluation?); a section heading about purpose/scope doesn't get reflected in career evaluation
Nonsensical - '지침의 목적 및 적용의 양정 기준' (disciplinary sentencing standards for purpose and application of guidelines); a section heading about purpose/scope doesn't have disciplinary standards
Nonsensical - '정의를 하려면 어떤 요건이 필요한가요?' (what requirements are needed to do a definition?); you don't 'do' a definition
Nonsensical - '관련 질의·응답을 하려면 어떻게 해야 하나요?' (how do I do related Q&A?); treats a Q&A reference section title as an action to perform
Nonsensical - '관련 질의·응답을 신청할 때 유의사항' (precautions when applying for related Q&A); you don't 'apply for' a Q&A section
Nonsensical - '인터넷 개인방송*인 경우를 받을 수 있는 자격' (qualifications to receive the case of internet personal broadcasting); template garbage
Nonsensical - '인터넷 개인방송*인 경우의 기간은 얼마나 되나요?' (how long is the period of the case of internet personal broadcasting?); a case type doesn't have an inherent duration
Nonsensical - '인터넷 개인방송*인 경우를 분류하면' (how do you classify the case of internet personal broadcasting?); template question treating a case label as classifiable
Vague template - '인터넷 개인방송*인 경우에 해당하는 것들은 무엇인가요?' too vague and generic to be a useful question
Nonsensical - '어떤 경우에 관련 질의·응답이 가능한가요?' (in what case is related Q&A possible?); treats a Q&A section title as something that becomes 'possible'
